name: Dice Kick
description:
Controls

Move

Kick dice while standing next to them

 Shoot when dice match


How to play

Kick the dice such that their top faces are the same. This will allow you to shoot bullets of the color on the dice. Enemies can only be damaged by bullets of their own color.

If you look closely, you can always tell what side to kick a die from to make it land how you want it to.

Credits

I've used this music pack by anismuz: Action Music Pack 1

Everything else is made by myself :3
